string.text: I need to get out of here somehow. Just what have I gotten myself into?...
Underground: find the Master's belongings in the collapsed village
According to the stalker I met, there's something in the collapsed village that is desired by the Master of the Underground. Just who the hell is he, anyway?
It's time to return to the stranger and find out what to do next.
Find the Master and kill him
The Master of the Underground won't let me free until I kill him. I just have to find where he's hiding.
That thing really fell for it. Now it's time to get out of here.
